challenges: finding skillful means to express positive ways to deal with problems
channeling and releasing their expressive energy constructively

guidelines: Treat self-doubt as a hurdle to be overcome, not a stop sign.
Give of yourself emotionally, even if you don't always feel you get back in equal measure.
Allow and express your feelings in the moment.
Trust and use your refined intuition and special resources.
questions: Have I held back my drive to express out of self-doubt?
Do I express my feelings and needs directly?
Am I sensitive to the needs of others?
Have I fully utilized my sensitive "internal guidance system" or other inner gifts?

advice: Engage in music that opens the heart, touches the emotions, and enlivens or uplifts
Eat and exercise intuitively - what feels emotionally and physically good
Avoid emotional eating or self-pampering when feeling down
Use expansive exercise with music to lift spirits when feeling blue
negative: Vulnerability in the throat area due to blocked expression
Sensitivity in the heart and knees
Energy blockages around the knees due to misunderstanding
Circulation and physical structure problems in the knees over time

opportunities: Excel in fields that offer self-expression

advice: View relationships as a form of spiritual practice
Be direct and straightforward about emotional needs and tendencies
Acknowledge and express, but not act upon, passing infatuations
Focus on emotional connection and open communication
negative: Can be manipulative or whiny to get their needs met
Prone to promiscuity or infidelity when emotions are not managed
May struggle with emotional or sexual fidelity
positive: Have a large and sensitive emotional energy field
Are in tune with their own and others' feelings
Value deep emotional connection and passionate involvement

advice: Use gifts and expression positively to attract financial abundance
Pursue careers that allow for self-expression, teaching, counseling, healing, performing, or creative expression
negative: Financial lack due to self-doubt and blocked expression
May not thrive in restrictive or emotionally unfulfilling work environments
positive: Natural teachers, counselors, healers, performers, and artists
Excel in roles involving communication, emotional intelligence, and intuition
Can be successful in any field but find most fulfillment in expressive roles
